Row.Text: For unknown reasons, a Shrubbery has sprung up in a place that it should not be! The overgrowth will spread to any adjacent plot that could contain Forest, and currently does not!

SHRUBBERY OVERGROWTH EVENT[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When event occurs:[NEWLINE]- These start in a random Grassland, Plains or Tundra tile with no Woods or Jungle.[NEWLINE]- Spreads to adjacent Grassland, Plains and Tundra tiles with no Woods or Jungle.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]- Affected tiles will damage units and pillage improvements.
Seemingly from out of nowhere, a Shrubbery appears in a place that it should not be, and it looks to grow ever larger.
+ The resulting Forest has improved yields [NEWLINE]- Damages units and improvements
A shrubbery that has unexpectedly appeared and is aggressively spreading.
A shrubbery that has unexpectedly appeared, but seems to have stopped spreading.
